Key Match Events: The Golden State Warriors had a 28-point lead in the first half but lost it in the second half and went into overtime.
Draymond Green fouled out with a disqualifying sixth foul.
Brandin Podziemski and Jonathan Kuminga scored crucial points in the fourth quarter and overtime to help the Warriors win.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr was proud of the Warriors' response to Houston's comeback.
Kerr mentioned that the team will have to get better when they face that kind of defense.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets used a switch-everything defense to disrupt the Warriors.
Alperen Sengun and Jalen Green were benched for the majority of the fourth quarter and overtime.
Others: The Warriors struggled with free throws, missing 18 in the game.
Tari Eason and Amen Thompson spearheaded Houston's comeback.
